principal.name: Dr. Sandeep Rankawat
principal.experience: More than 20 years in teaching and research. Before assuming the charge of Principal, Government Engineering College, Barmer, Rajasthan.
principal.message: Leading the institution with a vision of academic excellence and innovation. Our commitment is to provide quality technical education and foster research and development activities.

registrar.name: Mr. Kamal Panwar
registrar.experience: More than 26 years in teaching and research. Before assuming the charge of Registrar, Government Engineering College, Barmer, Rajasthan.
registrar.message: It is a matter of great pride to serve as the Registrar of our esteemed institution. With extensive experience in academic administration and a strong commitment to excellence, we ensure smooth functioning of all academic and administrative processes.

viceChancellor.name: Prof. Ajay Kumar Sharma
viceChancellor.experience: Dr Sharma has an experience of more than 35 years of in teaching and research. Before assuming the charge of Vice Chancellor, MBM University, Jodhpur, Rajasthan
viceChancellor.message: As the Vice Chancellor, I am committed to fostering academic excellence, research innovation, and holistic development of our students. Our institution stands as a beacon of quality technical education, preparing future leaders and innovators.
